description.translate: Let us break this peace so quiet, that even the eternal mornings may fear us.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Colère de Sôrän\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Brisons cette paix si tranquille, pour\"}","{\"text\":\"§7que même les matins éternels nous craignent.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Let us break this peace so quiet, that\"}","{\"text\":\"§7even the eternal mornings may fear us.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7HER§a1 §7DAR§a1 §7HUN§c-1\"}"],color:16514979}}
